text: [redacted_name] corre al campo e avvisa dell'accaduto [redacted_name] e [redacted_name]. I due decidono allora di organizzare delle trappole con delle sentinelle intorno al campo. La notte passa però apparentemente tranquilla, sino a quando la mattina dopo [redacted_name], [redacted_name] e [redacted_name] sentono delle urla. Arrivati sul posto scoprono che [redacted_name], uno di loro, è stato ucciso. [redacted_name], dopo essersi consultato con [redacted_name], decide di tendere una trappola a [redacted_name]. Usando [redacted_name], che si propone come esca, prende una delle quattro pistole contenute nella valigetta dello sceriffo [redacted_name] e distribuisce le restanti a [redacted_name], [redacted_name] [redacted_name]. [redacted_name] vuole andare con loro e, malgrado [redacted_name] non sia d'accordo, [redacted_name] le consegna la pistola dello sceriffo che lui teneva custodita. Anche [redacted_name] vorrebbe far parte del piano, ma quando [redacted_name] gli chiede se sa sparare, non può che non rispondergli.
trans: [redacted_name] runs to the camp and informs [redacted_name] and [redacted_name] about what happened. The two decide to set up traps with sentinels around the camp. The night appears to pass peacefully until the following morning when [redacted_name], [redacted_name], and [redacted_name] hear screams. Upon arriving at the scene, they discover that [redacted_name], one of their group, has been killed.After consulting with [redacted_name], [redacted_name] decides to set a trap for [redacted_name]. Using [redacted_name], who volunteers to act as bait, [redacted_name] takes one of the four pistols from Sheriff [redacted_name]’s case and distributes the remaining weapons to [redacted_name], [redacted_name], and [redacted_name]. [redacted_name] insists on joining the plan, and despite [redacted_name]'s initial objections, [redacted_name] hands her the sheriff's pistol he had been keeping secure.[redacted_name] also wants to participate, but when [redacted_name] asks if he knows how to shoot, he can only remain silent.
